name: step-ca
description: Smallstep Certificates is a self-hosted, ACME-compatible certificate authority and identity system. It automates certificate issuance and rotation for machines and services via CLI and APIs.

features.title: Certificate Authority
features.description: Issues and manages X.509 certificates for internal infrastructure

features.title: Acme Protocol
features.description: Automates certificate issuance with Let's Encrypt-compatible ACME

features.title: Short
features.description: Issues certificates with short lifespans for enhanced security

features.title: Multiple Provisioners
features.description: Supports ACME, OAuth, OIDC, and other authentication methods

features.title: Ssh Certificates
features.description: Issues SSH certificates for secure server and user authentication

features.title: REST API
features.description: Manages certificates programmatically via REST API

features.title: Hardware Security
features.description: Integrates with HSMs and cloud KMS for key protection
